metadata.title: CVE-2021-33038 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in management/commands/hyperkitty_import.py in HyperKitty through 1.3.4. When importing a private mailing list's archives, these archives are publicly visible for the duration of the import. For example, sensitive information might be available on the web for an hour during a large migration from Mailman 2 to Mailman 3.

criterions.comment: hyperkitty package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
